report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory IBM Planning Analytics Workspace Vulnerabilities
Rewterz Threat Advisory IBM Planning Analytics Workspace Vulnerabilities
text: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 could allow an attacker to upload arbitrary executable files which, when executed by an unsuspecting victim could result in code execution.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory IBM Planning Analytics Workspace Vulnerabilities
text: IBM Planning Analytics Workspace 2.0 could be vulnerable to malicious file upload by not validating the file types or sizes. Attackers can make use of this weakness and upload malicious executable files into the system and it can be sent to victim for performing further attacks.
